tool_description: Scrape ads from Fotocasa. Get location suggestions, list of ads and property details with this API.
name: Fotocasa
title: Fotocasa

api_list.name: Get Suggestions
Property Details
api_list.description: Get property details. Requires the property ID.

api_list.name: List Properties
api_list.description: List Properties. Requires locationId, lat and lon which can be obtained through autocomplete endpoint. Pick the property type value to extract Homes, Premises, Garages, Offices, Box Rooms, Lands or Buildings.

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: Also known as combinedLocationIds. Get this value from suggested locations (autocomplete endpoint). All Spain ID: 724,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0

required_parameters.name: sorting
required_parameters.description:
Pick between:

Fotocasa Rating: scoring (default)
Latest: publicationDate
Cheapest: price
Most expensive:

optional_parameters.name: onlyCount
optional_parameters.description: Returns only the number of properties in the selected location. All other parameters will be null. Fast response.

optional_parameters.name: clientId
optional_parameters.description: Extract properties from a real estate. You can get this ID from the profile URL, last parameter. Example: clientId=9202750735146

optional_parameters.name: isNewConstruction
optional_parameters.description: Set false if you want to get only second hand. Set true if you want to get only New construction (same as Buy > New Home). Don't include if you want to find all homes (Buy > Home).

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description: Property Type to search. Default value is Homes.
